author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-last-of-us-part-ii-remastered/#complete

Experience the complete story that inspired the TV show with definitive versions of two award-winning games, featuring graphical and gameplay improvements made possible by the PlayStation®5 console. The Last of Us Complete includes both The Last of Us Part I, including the story expansion Left Behind, as well as The Last of Us Part II Remastered, featuring the roguelike survival mode No Return, Lost Levels, and more. 

Whether this is your first time stepping into the world of The Last of Us or you’re a player returning to the series since playing on PS4® or PS3®, dive into Joel and Ellie’s cross-country trek in Part I, and experience Ellie and Abby’s emotional journeys in Part II Remastered. 

#ps5 #ps5games #thelastofus 

Rated Mature
title: The Last of Us Complete - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/the-elder-scrolls-online/

The dreaded Worm Cult has returned, and once more Tamriel’s adventurers will need to gather their allies, new and old, to stop the cult and their terrible plans for the isle of Solstice. Your new ESO adventure begins here! 

ESO’s 2025 Content Pass and 2025 Premium Edition are now available for purchase and include The Seasons of the Worm Cult Part 1, arriving June 18 for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4. Pick up either edition before launch to acquire instant access to new dungeons and early rewards, including a new mount, pet, and emote pack.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #elderscrolls #elderscrollsonline
title: The Elder Scrolls Online - Return of the Worm Cult | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008217

The Alters will land on PS5 on June the 13th!

At first glance, The Alters may seem like a familiar survival experience: a lone protagonist stranded on a distant planet, trying to outrun an encroaching cosmic threat. But things get weird—and wonderfully human—once you realize that the only way forward is to create alternate versions of yourself. These “Alters” aren’t clones or mindless helpers. They’re fractured echoes of who you could’ve been if you’d made different life choices. And sometimes, they don’t like you very much.
It’s this uniquely introspective spin that makes The Alters far more than another sci-fi survival game. Jan Dolski, the game’s protagonist, is just an ordinary man caught in an extraordinary situation. With the help of advanced technology, he generates Alters shaped by “what if” moments—crucial crossroads in life where one decision could have led to a different personality, skill set, and worldview. These alt
title: The Alters - Date Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014600 

Duskfade is coming to PlayStation 5 in 2026. Wishlist Now!

Shatter the shackles of time as you jump, swing, and slash through a fantastic world in this love letter to classic 3D action platformers. Zirian, accompanied by his mechanical Cuckoo, must save his sister from a mysterious Clock Tower that has plunged the land into eternal night.

Duskfade is a heartfelt tribute to the golden age of 3D action-platformers, packed with tight, fluid gameplay, stunning world design, and a deeply emotional story that hits hard in all the right ways.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Duskfade - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

description:
Pilo and the Holobook is an exploration-based adventure game set in a colorful galaxy where you guide Pilo, an apprentice explorer, on a journey to document the universe’s wonders and solve mysteries. Using the Holobook, a powerful encyclopedia-like tool, Pilo collects stickers to record his discoveries and uncover the story behind a mysterious dark force known as the Tar.

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012495

Step back into a world of thought-provoking puzzles, philosophical intrigue, and breathtaking visuals with The Talos Principle: Reawakened. This definitive edition revisits the groundbreaking narrative of The Talos Principle, immersing players in an expanded and remastered journey through the world of the Simulation.

The Talos Principle: Reawakened introduces new content, enhanced gameplay, and a gorgeously upgraded presentation. Relive the critically acclaimed expansion Road to Gehenna and dive into an all-new chapter, In the Beginning. Discover the story of Alexandra Drennan as she faces profound existential questions while orchestrating the Simulation's first critical test, challenging players to think deeply about the human condition.

#ps5 #ps5games #talosprinciple
title: The Talos Principle: Reawakened - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008503/

Explore the gameplay and motivations of the key members of Expedition 33 as they set course to destroy the Paintress so she may never paint death again.

Meet Monoco, the Gestral. Friendly yet bloodthirsty, he, like all Gestrals, thrives on the thrill of battle. To him, combat is meditation, and he can’t resist a duel—even with friends. Untouched by the Paintress, his only real reason for joining the expedition is the same drive that compels him to do most things: the love of a good fight.

Monoco possesses a unique ability—he collects the feet of Nevrons, absorbing their skills and transforming into them during battle. One of the few Gestrals who can speak the human language, his surprisingly scholarly manner contrasts with his clumsy, rough-edged demeanor.

Monoco is the final Character Spotlight. Expedition 33 will release on April 24 2025 on Playstation 5. Pre-order now!

#ps5 #ps5games #clairobscur 

Rated Mature
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Monoco Character Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Lorn's Lure is coming to Playstation in 2025:
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014407

Lorn’s Lure is an atmospheric narrative first-person platformer with novel climb-anything mechanics and modernized retro 3D graphics.

Leaving his home colony while tracking a mysterious glitch, an android finds himself in the midst of a vast and dangerous structure, completely hidden from his people’s knowledge. Unable to go back, you must keep going to find out where he is being led… And why he left in the first place.

Features:
BACK TO THE PAST - retro ‘90s PC graphics with a modern flair,
DIVE INTO THE STORY - uncover the mysterious lore as you traverse the world,
CHALLENGE YOURSELF - jump, climb, slide, and scan your way around obstacles, using simple mechanics,
SKY’S THE LIMIT - with no “parkour ledges”, climb almost any vertical wall face using your pickaxes,
TOUGH, BUT FAIR - your mistakes won’t be punished by redoing lengthy sections. Just keep climbing!
FIND YO
title: Lorn's Lure - Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10007310

The wait is over – the fight begins today!
Pocket Bravery, the high-octane, retro-inspired 2D fighter, is OUT NOW on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4! Get ready to throw down with elemental-based combat, a diverse roster of warriors, and lightning-fast gameplay built for both genre newcomers and seasoned FGC veterans.

⸻

🔥 WHY YOU NEED TO PLAY POCKET BRAVERY 🔥

⚔️ Elemental-Based Combat System – Supercharge your special moves with fire, ice, lightning and more!
🕹️ Classic Fighting Gameplay – Tight controls, combo-heavy mechanics, and deep tactical play.
🌍 Rollback Netcode – Seamless online play with smooth matchmaking and competitive stability.
🎨 Gorgeous Pixel Art – Vibrant animations and dynamic stages with serious retro flair.
💥 Original Roster of Warriors – Each fighter brings unique style, personality, and elemental power.

Play now and prove you’re the ultimate fighter!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #pocketbravery
title: Pocket Bravery - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
